name: DALL·E
about: OpenAI's image generation model for photorealistic and artistic images from prompts.
summary: Generate images from text prompts with flexible styles and realism.
details: DALL·E excels at generating creative or photorealistic images. Include style and composition cues in the prompt.
howTo: Include subject, lighting, and style in the prompt.
If you need variations, request multiple outputs and pick the best.
